title: Calories in Rotisserie Chicken Breast
meta_description: Learn calories in rotisserie chicken breast per 100g, with protein, fat, carbs, sodium details, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: With skin, roasted rotisserie-style with light seasoning; boneless breast meat; no added sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, seasoning level, skin inclusion, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of rotisserie chicken breast provides ~190 kcal and ~25g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Extra seasoning or brine (higher sodium, slight calorie bump)

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g rotisserie chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 190 kcal per 100g with skin and light seasoning.

faqs.q: What's the protein in rotisserie chicken breast?
Does rotisserie chicken have more calories than plain roasted?
faqs.a: Slightly higher due to skin and seasonings; skinless is similar to plain at ~165 kcal per 100g.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in rotisserie chicken breast?
faqs.a: Around 500mg per 100g from seasonings; varies by brand.

faqs.q: Are carbs present in rotisserie chicken breast?
faqs.a: Negligible carbs (0g per 100g); it's primarily protein and fat.
